title: Nepal
summary: Nepal is a country in Southern Asia. The capital is Kathmandu. Population: 29.9 million. Area: 147,181 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Nepal is the world's only non-quadrilateral flag of a sovereign country. It takes the shape of two adjoining right-angled triangles and has a crimson red field with deep blue edges. Within the smaller upper triangle is an emblem of the upper half of a white sun resting on an upward facing white crescent. The lower triangle bears a white sun with twelve rays.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
